sn3.8:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena rājā pasenadi kosalo mallikāya deviyā saddhiṃ uparipāsādavaragato hoti.
sn3.8:4.3: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo mallikaṃ deviṃ etadavoca:
sn3.8:4.4: “atthi nu kho te, mallike, kocañño attanā piyataro”ti?
sn3.8:4.5: “Natthi kho me, mahārāja, kocañño attanā piyataro.
sn3.8:4.6: Tuyhaṃ pana, mahārāja, atthañño koci attanā piyataro”ti?
sn3.8:4.7: “Mayhampi kho, mallike, natthañño koci attanā piyataro”ti.
sn3.8:5.1: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo pāsādā orohitvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn3.8:5.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho rājā pasenadi kosalo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn3.8:5.4: “idhāhaṃ, bhante, mallikāya deviyā saddhiṃ uparipāsādavaragato mallikaṃ deviṃ etadavocaṃ:
sn3.8:5.5: ‘atthi nu kho te, mallike, kocañño attanā piyataro’ti?
sn3.8:5.6: Evaṃ vutte, bhante, mallikā devī maṃ etadavoca:
sn3.8:5.7: ‘natthi kho me, mahārāja, kocañño attanā piyataro.
sn3.8:5.8: Tuyhaṃ pana, mahārāja, atthañño koci attanā piyataro’ti?
sn3.8:5.9: Evaṃ vuttāhaṃ, bhante, mallikaṃ deviṃ etadavocaṃ:
sn3.8:5.10: ‘mayhampi kho, mallike, natthañño koci attanā piyataro’”ti.
sn3.8:6.1: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi:
